name: namx-huv-cars
description: "Faouzi ANNAJAH", wants to share the immense experience of the NAMX HUV the largest fuel cell SUV.The request of the CEO & Founder at NamX is to share the immersive experience of the largest HUV:  To present the performance indicators of the vehicle in a futuristic way, creates the process pre-ordered on the website of the brand.
